General.Name: Lingotes
General.Description: Lingotes Especiales, S.A. engages in the design, development, casting, machining, and assembly of grey and spheroidal iron parts worldwide. The company primarily manufactures brake discs. It serves automotive, civil works, submarine wiring, electrical appliances, household, and general industries, as well as industrial and agricultural vehicles. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Valladolid, Spain. Lingotes Especiales, S.A. is a subsidiary of Frenos y Conjuntos.

1.Name: Mr. Felix  Cano de la Fuente
1.Title: CEO, MD & Exec. Director
